TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptReference extends System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase

summary.span: 注册 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件，以便在 ASP.NET 网页上使用。

span.span: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) file for use on an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过对象注册 JavaScript 文件，将该文件包含在 ASP.NET 网页上 。You can include a JavaScript file on an ASP.NET Web page by registering it through a object. 你可以在网站上将作为 .js 文件 (的脚本文件注册为静态脚本文件) 。You can register a script file that is located as a .js file (a static script file) on the Web site. 你还可以将嵌入的脚本文件注册为程序集中的资源。You can also register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 注册脚本文件后，可以在网页上的客户端脚本中使用其功能。After registering the script file, you can use its functions in client script on the Web page. 若要注册静态脚本文件，请将 对象的属性设置 为文件的相对位置。To register a static script file, set the property of the object to the relative location of the file. 若要将作为资源嵌入的脚本文件注册到程序集中，请将 属性设置为包含该文件的程序集的名称。To register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly, set the property to the name of the assembly that contains the file. 然后将 属性设置为嵌入到程序集中的 .js 文件的名称。Then set the property to the name of the .js file that is embedded in the assembly. 在这种情况下，必须嵌入脚本文件，而不是链接。In that case, the script file must be embedded, not linked. 设置 属性以指示是使用脚本的调试版本还是发布版本。You set the property to indicate whether to use the debug or release version of the script. 该值产生不同的结果，具体取决于它是引用独立脚本文件还是引用嵌入为程序集中的资源的脚本文件。The value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 独立脚本文件是使用属性定义的 。A standalone script file is defined with the property. 必须通过和属性访问程序集引用 。An assembly reference must be accessed through the and properties. 值的结果如下所示 ：The results for the value are as follows: - 当应用于独立脚本文件时，如果该文件 指定了属性，则 值等效于 。When it is applied to a standalone script file where the property is specified, the value is equivalent to . - 当应用于程序集中的脚本引用时，等效于 。When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, is equivalent to . 仅 指定时，它用于引用脚本。When only is specified, it is used to reference the script. 如果 同时指定了和属性，则 使用属性而不是 ，但 该值仍等效于 。When and the property are both specified, the property is used instead of , but the value is still equivalent to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用嵌入到控件程序集中的自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 该程序集假定在网站的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件对控件进行动画处理 。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件编译为名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 的嵌入资源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用和属性注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件 。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例，请使用自定义控件，将示例中显示的 JavaScript 文件编译为嵌入的资源。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入网站的 Bin 文件夹中。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅 [演练：将 Javascript 文件作为资源嵌入到程序集中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例演示使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示了自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示支持 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例演示必须添加到包含自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件中的代码。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含作为嵌入资源的客户端脚本文件的程序集名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.

value.span: 包含作为嵌入资源的客户端脚本文件的程序集完全限定名或部分限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified or partially qualified name of the assembly that contains a client script file as an embedded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用作为嵌入资源包含在程序集中的客户端脚本文件时，可以设置属性。You set the property when you reference a client script file that is included as an embedded resource in an assembly. 设置 为完全限定或部分限定的程序集名称。Set to the fully qualified or partially qualified assembly name. 完全限定的程序集名称包括名称、区域性、公钥和版本号。A fully qualified assembly name includes a name, culture, public key, and version number. 部分限定的程序集名称只包含名称。A partially qualified assembly name includes only a name. 为指定值时 ，还必须在属性中指定嵌入资源的名称 。When you specify a value for , you must also specify the name of the embedded resource in the property. 否则， 将引发。Otherwise, an will be thrown. 引用的程序集必须位于网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。The assembly being referenced must be located in either the Bin folder of the Web site or in the global assembly cache. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用嵌入到控件程序集中的自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 该程序集假定在网站的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件对控件进行动画处理 。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件编译为名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 的嵌入资源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用和属性注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件 。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例，请使用自定义控件，将示例中显示的 JavaScript 文件编译为嵌入的资源。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入网站的 Bin 文件夹中。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅 [演练：将 Javascript 文件作为资源嵌入到程序集中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例演示使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示了自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示支持 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例演示必须添加到包含自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件中的代码。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从资源注册客户端脚本文件时，URL 中是否包括 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property is included in the URL when you register a client script file from a resource.

value.span: 如果在注册客户端脚本时未使用脚本路径，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the script path is not used when you register the client script; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果要注册客户端脚本文件，而不 在脚本文件的 URL 中包含值，则将设置为。You set to `true` when you want to register a client script file without including the value in the URL of the script file.

summary.span: 获取或设置包含客户端脚本文件的嵌入资源的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the embedded resource that contains the client script file.

value.span: 作为资源嵌入到程序集中的客户端脚本文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性以引用嵌入为程序集中的资源的客户端脚本文件。You set the property to reference a client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 如果在 同一脚本引用中同时定义和属性的值，该属性将 优先。If you define values for both the and properties in the same script reference, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用嵌入到控件程序集中的自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 该程序集假定在网站的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件对控件进行动画处理 。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件编译为名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 的嵌入资源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用和属性注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件 。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例，请使用自定义控件，将示例中显示的 JavaScript 文件编译为嵌入的资源。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入网站的 Bin 文件夹中。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅 [演练：将 Javascript 文件作为资源嵌入到程序集中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例演示使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示了自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示支持 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例演示必须添加到包含自定义控件和 JavaScript 文件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件中的代码。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]
